original_text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.
korean_text: 세례 요한의 때부터 지금까지 천국은 침노를 당하나니 침노하는 자는 빼앗느니라

sentences.original_text: And from the days of John the Baptist
the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence
and the violent take it by force
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 폭력적인 자들이 그것을 힘으로 빼앗느니라
